title: something is wrong with the club i created
body: hey there, ive got a club thats full to the brim, im the owner but it says on the new client im not in a club is there anyone that can help me or someone that could look into it, i want that BoMb nxt to my name again cheers

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently a known issue, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support with the club name and tag and they should be able to help you out.

Only on the new client? I'm the owner of mine and I don't appear in my own club on the new or the old client. All my friends still see me marked as the owner but I don't have the club name next to my name. Emailed Riot about it and they said they're still working on a fix.
